entry.tran: (书中的)参见项，互见条，相互参照
entry.def: A cross-reference is a note in a book which tells you that there is relevant or more detailed information in another part of the book.
If something such as a book is cross-referenced, cross-references are put in it.

example.ex: Nearly 2,300 plant lists have been checked and cross-referenced.
example.tran: 已经对约2,300份植物列表进行核对，并注明了相互参照项。

example.ex: ...an index of products and services which is cross-referenced to the supplying companies.
example.tran: 注明供货商参照项的产品和服务索引

means.word_mean: 1. a reference at one place in a work to information at another place in the same work

means.word_mean: (同一书中的)互相参照,互见,对照处

sentences.en: The cross-references refer you to information in other parts of the dictionary.
sentences.cn: 互见引导你在词典的其他部分寻找信息。

sentences.en: In this dictionary cross-references are shown in capital letters.
sentences.cn: 本词典中相互参照的词用大写字母表示。

sentences.en: The reader is cross-referenced to the entry “center”.
